Row.Text: Grands one free [ICON_GREATE_PEOPLE] Great Person of your choice and you get global +3 [ICON_HAPPINES_1] Happiness.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Increases the generation of [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People by 10% in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adds yields +10 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism when Natinalism is discovered.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires[ENDCOLOR] 5 [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower.
A free [ICON_GREATE_PEOPLE] Great Person of your choice appairs near your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.[NEWLINE]Add yields +2 [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE ]Golden Age Points.
The Treasure Room increases the [ICON_GOLD] Gold income in your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital by +10%.

Provides +10% more [ICON_GOLD] Gold in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grands one [ICON_GREAT_MERCHANT] Great Merchant slot, and enemies get a [ICON_GOLD] Gold bonus, anytime they plunder your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires[ENDCOLOR] 3 [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower.
The Palace Gallery increases the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital excellent.

The Palace Gallery provides 1 free [ICON_GREAT_WORK] Greatwork slot for Artifacts and adds +3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires[ENDCOLOR] 3 [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower.
Increases the global [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness by 2 and boost the [ICON_FOOD] Food income in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.

Provides +2 global [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness, and also adds +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food to each [ICON_RES_APPLE] Apple, [ICON_RES_MANGO] Mango, [ICON_RES_BANANA] Bananas and [ICON_RES_BERRIES] Berries resources worked by the city.[NEWLINE]Increase [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires[ENDCOLOR] 2 [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower.

Increases the [ICON_STRENGHT] Strentgh of our [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital, boost new trained [ICON_SILVER_FIST] Units with +15 [ICON_WAR] XP, and you get two free [ICON_WAR] Warrior.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires[ENDCOLOR] 2 [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower and [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Sacrifice Cult[ENDCOLOR] must be discovered.
Adds +7.5 [ICON_STRENGHT] Strenght to the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grands +15 [ICON_WAR] XP to all new land units, and two free [ICON_WAR] Warriors appaire.

Provides one free [ICON_RES_MANUSCRIPT] Manuscript and increases the [ICON_RESEARCH] Science output in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requirement:[ENDCOLOR]One [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower resources.
Grands one free [ICON_RES_MANUSCRIPT] Manuscript, a very rar luxury resource.
Provides yields +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food for every animal resource that can be eat.

Provides yields +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food, for each source of [ICON_RES_SQUID] Squid, [ICON_RES_FISH] Fish, [ICON_RES_WHALE] Whale, [ICON_RES_DEER] Deer, [ICON_RES_COW] Cow and [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requirement:[ENDCOLOR]One [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower resources.
Increase the [ICON_RESEARCH] Science output of the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
Provides one [ICON_GREAT_SCIENTIST] Scientist slot and add yields +2 [ICON_RESEARCH] to the Capital.
Increases the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital and provides +3 [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower four your Empire.
Grands 3 additionel [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower resources and gives a little boost [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
The Palace Acreage provides a boost to your Palace [ICON_FOOD] Food.

Provides a little boost in [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and you get a extra [ICON_TRADE] trade route.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requirement:[ENDCOLOR]One [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower resources and [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Masonry[ENDCOLOR] must be reasearched.

The Palace Grand Entrance provides a boost to your Palace [ICON_GOLD] Gold income you get one extra [ICON_TRADE] trade route.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requirement:[ENDCOLOR]One [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower resources.
The radius of caravans is increased by +15% [ICON_FLOWER] , and palso increases the [ICON_GOLD] Gold income frome [ICON_TRADE] trade routes with this city.

Provides a +10% higher appairing for your [ICON_GREAT_GENERAL] Great Generals, boost the city [ICON_STRENGHT] Strength, and one free [ICON_GREAT_GENERAL] Great general appairs near the [ICON_CAPITAL] city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires[ENDCOLOR] 1 [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower.

Provides a +10% higher appairing for your [ICON_GREAT_GENERAL] Great Generals, boost the city [ICON_STRENGHT] Strength, and one free [ICON_GREAT_GENERAL] Great general appairs near the [ICON_CAPITAL] city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requirement:[ENDCOLOR]Three [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower.

Provides a little boost in [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and you get +2 global [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Increase the religious pressure in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital by 15%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Add yields +3 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism when Papacy is discovered.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires[ENDCOLOR] 3 [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower resources are needed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can only build in your [ICON_CAPITAL] Holycity, if you founded a [ICON_RELIGION] Religion.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Sculpture[ENDCOLOR] must be discovered.
Provides one additional [ICON_MISSIONARY] Missionary spread, for each new trained [ICON_MISSIONARY] Missionary in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.

Increase the the heal rate of [ICON_SILVER_FIST] units in this city by +10%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Gives a boost for city [ICON_STRENGTH]defence.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires[ENDCOLOR] 3[ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower resources are needed.
Units heal now +15% faster in this city.

Provides a good boost in [ICON_FOOD] Food for the city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Global +2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1]Happines.[NEWLINE]Increase [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requirement:[ENDCOLOR]Five [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower resources are needed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Clergy[ENDCOLOR] must be discovered.
+10% of[ICON_FOOD] Food are saved when a new [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Global +2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness.

Grand a little boost in [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides one [ICON_GREAT_WRITER] Great Writer slot.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires[ENDCOLOR] 3 [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower and 1 [ICON_RES_PAPER] Paper to be build.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Mathematic[ENDCOLOR] must be discovered.
Grants 1 [ICON_RES_MANUSCRIPT] Manuscript.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides one [ICON_GREAT_WRITER] Great Writer slot.

Provides +10% [ICON_WORKER] Worker speed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Enenemy [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_RELIGION] Religion get a -10% malus.[NEWLINE]Increase [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires[ENDCOLOR] 4 [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Hierachy[ENDCOLOR] must be discovered.

Foreign [ICON_RELIGION] Religions pressure increased be 10%, enemy spies get a -10% malus, and your [ICON_WORKER] Worker speed is increased by +10%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Global [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness will be a little bit increased.
[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requirement:[ENDCOLOR]Three [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower resources are needed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Monarchy[ENDCOLOR] must be discovered.

Increases the appairins of [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People in this city by 10%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Global +2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+100 [ICON_GOLD] Gold every time a [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People was expended

Add yields +5 [ICON_PEACE] Faith, Global +2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]New trained [ICON_MISSIONARY] Missionaries in this city, get one extra religious spread.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requries four [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Note:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Can only be build on a Holy City.
Gives a massiv boost forward your [ICON_RELIGION] Religion.
Grants three additional [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horses.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Two [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower to be build.

Add yields +3 [ICON_GOLD] and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture to each of your Brothel.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Note:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]City must contain a Throne room and a Mosque.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]5 [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower to be build.

Add yields +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith and +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness to each of your tempels.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][IOCN_RELIGION]Religious pressure in this [IOCN_CAPITAL] city is increased by 15%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requirement[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]The Holy Temple must be build in this city.
Provides a boost forward to [ICON_PEACE] Faith and [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness.
Grants +3 [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Note:[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]City must contain a stuff house.
Provides extra [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower and gives a little [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production bonus.
The Alchemy Hall increases your production.

Alchemy is an influential philosophical tradition whose early practitioners' claims to profound powers were known from antiquity. The defining objectives of alchemy are varied; these include the creation of the fabled philosopher's stone possessing powers including the capability of turning base metals into the noble metals gold or silver, as well as an elixir of life conferring youth and immortality.
